species.name: chansey
descriptions: A gentle and kindhearted Pokémon that shares its nutritious eggs if it sees an injured Pokémon.
A kindly Pokémon that lays highly nutritious eggs and shares them with injured Pokémon or people.
A rare and elusive Pokémon that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to catch one.
Because the eggs on their bellies have been overharvested by people in the past, the Chansey population remains very small.
Being few in number and difficult to capture, it is said to bring happiness to the Trainer who catches it.

abilities.name: natural-cure
abilities.effect: Cures any major status ailment upon switching out.

abilities.name: serene-grace
abilities.effect: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

abilities.name: healer
abilities.effect: Has a 30% chance of curing each adjacent ally of any major status ailment after each turn.
